desc: The TrimMaster is the first tool to save you time and money trimming windows and doors. The patented design of the TrimMaster allows for flawless installation of windows and door trim easily and quickly, no matter who installs the trim. Whether you’re a professional or a DIYer, TrimMaster works every time.

layout.text: Get perfect trim reveals every time with our easy to use, compact, patented design. Stop pulling tape and take the guess work out of your trim jobs.
